# Incredibox Sprunki Game

> A unique music game platform that combines the classic Incredibox experience with innovative gameplay and creative features.

Incredibox Sprunki Game is a web-based music game platform that allows users to create and share their own musical compositions through an intuitive and engaging interface.

## 核心内容
- [游戏列表](https://incrediboxsprunkimod.com/sprunked-games)：提供多种音乐游戏体验
- [关于我们](https://incrediboxsprunkimod.com/about)：平台简介和发展历程
- [联系我们](https://incrediboxsprunkimod.com/contact)：联系我们的渠道

## 常用资源
- [隐私政策](https://incrediboxsprunkimod.com/privacy)：隐私政策和使用条款
- [GitHub](https://github.com/asce0110/IncrediboxSprunkigame)：项目源代码

## 技术信息
- 框架：Next.js 13.5.6
- 部署：Vercel
- 数据库：Supabase
- AI模型：GPT-4
- 版本：1.0.0
- 最后更新：2024-04-29

## Model Information
- Model: GPT-4
- Provider: OpenAI
- Version: 4.0
- Last Updated: 2024-04-29

## Usage
This website uses LLMs for:
1. Content Generation
2. Code Assistance
3. Documentation
4. User Support

## Implementation Details
- API Integration: OpenAI API
- Model Parameters:
  - Temperature: 0.7
  - Max Tokens: 2000
  - Top P: 0.9
  - Frequency Penalty: 0.0
  - Presence Penalty: 0.0

## Security & Privacy
- All user data is encrypted
- No personal information is stored
- API keys are securely managed
- Regular security audits

## Performance Metrics
- Response Time: < 2s
- Accuracy Rate: > 95%
- Error Rate: < 1%

## Maintenance
- Regular model updates
- Performance monitoring
- Error tracking
- User feedback integration

## Contact
For any questions about our LLMs implementation:
- Email: support@incrediboxsprunkimod.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/asce0110/IncrediboxSprunkigame
